Ability.Name: -- Hotkeys --
Ability.Lua:
if not leftkeydown then leftkeydown = 0 end
if IsLeftControlKeyDown() and GetTime() - leftkeydown > 1 then leftkeydown = GetTime()
if StopRota then
StopRota = false print("Rotation reenabled!")
else
StopRota = true print("Rotation stopped!")
end end
if not rightkeydown then rightkeydown = 0 end
if IsAltKeyDown() and IsControlKeyDown() and GetTime() - rightkeydown > 1 then leftkeydown = GetTime()
if Cleave then
Cleave = false print("Cleave disabled!")
else
Cleave = true print("Cleave enabled!")
end end

Ability.Name: -- Offensive Spells --
Ability.Lua: if UnitAffectingCombat("player") == nil or ( not UnitAffectingCombat("target") and not UnitIsPlayer("target") ) then return true end

Ability.Name: -- Start Fight --
Ability.Lua: if StopRota or UnitIsDeadOrGhost("player") or IsMounted() or UnitChannelInfo("player") ~= nil or UnitCastingInfo("player") ~= nil or UnitBuff("player", "Drink") or UnitBuff("player", "Food") then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Berserker Rage
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Heroic Strike", "target") == 1 and UnitLevel("target") == -1 then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Execute
Ability.Lua: if 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") <= 20 and IsSpellInRange("Heroic Strike", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Slam
F:Heroic Strike
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Heroic Strike", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Heroic Throw
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Heroic Throw", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Recklessness
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Heroic Strike", "target") == 1 and UnitLevel("target") == -1 then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Bloodrage
Ability.Lua: if UnitPower("player") <= 65 then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Cleave
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Heroic Strike", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Bloodthirst
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Heroic Strike", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: USE:Trinket 1
Ability.Lua: local _,cd,havecd = GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",13) if cd == 0 and havecd == 1 and UnitChannelInfo("player") == nil and UnitCastingInfo("player") == nil and UnitAffectingCombat("player") and UnitLevel("target") == -1 then UseInventoryItem(13) return true end

Ability.Name: USE:Trinket 2
Ability.Lua: local _,cd,havecd = GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",14) if cd == 0 and havecd == 1 and UnitChannelInfo("player") == nil and UnitCastingInfo("player") == nil and UnitAffectingCombat("player") and UnitLevel("target") == -1 then UseInventoryItem(14) return true end

Ability.Name: A:Battle Stance
Ability.Lua:
local DS = GetShapeshiftForm()
if DS ~= 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: A:Execute
Ability.Lua: if 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") <= 20 and UnitPower("player") >= 30 and IsSpellInRange("Heroic Strike", "target") == 1 or UnitBuffID("player", 52437) then return true end

Ability.Name: A:Charge
Ability.Lua: if IsShiftKeyDown() and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then RunMacroText("/target [@mouseover]") return true end

Ability.Name: A:Slam
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Heroic Strike", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: A:Rend
Ability.Lua: if UnitDebuffID("target",47465,"player") == nil and IsSpellInRange("Rend", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: A:Overpower
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Overpower", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Berserker Stance
Ability.Lua:
local DS = GetShapeshiftForm()
if DS ~= 3 then return true end

Ability.Name: A:Heroic Strike
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Heroic Strike", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: A:Bloodrage
Ability.Lua: if UnitPower("player") <= 65 and UnitLevel("target") == -1 then return true end

Ability.Name: USE:Mouseover Skill
Ability.Lua: if UnitAffectingCombat("player") and IsMouseButtonDown() then RunMacroText("/click "..GetMouseFocus():GetName()) end

Ability.Name: F:Whirlwind
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Heroic Strike", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: A:Cleave
Ability.Lua: if Cleave == true and IsSpellInRange("Heroic Strike", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: A:Mortal Strike
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Mortal Strike", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: A:Bladestorm
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Mortal Strike", "target") == 1 and UnitLevel("target") == -1 then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Death Wish
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Heroic Strike", "target") == 1 and UnitLevel("target") == -1 then return true end

Ability.Name: D:Shockwave
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Heroic Strike", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: D:Concussion Blow
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Heroic Strike", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: A:Sweeping Strikes
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Heroic Strike", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Battle Shout
Ability.Lua:
local Shout, _, _, _, _, _, hwexpire = UnitBuffID("player", 47436)
if Shout ~= nill then hwexpire =(hwexpire - GetTime()) if hwexpire < 5 then return true end else return true end

Ability.Name: D:Defensive Stance
Ability.Lua:
local DS = GetShapeshiftForm()
if DS ~= 2 then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Commanding Shout
Ability.Lua:
local Shout, _, _, _, _, _, hwexpire = UnitBuffID("player", 47440)
if Shout ~= nill then hwexpire =(hwexpire - GetTime()) if hwexpire < 5 then return true end else return true end

Ability.Name: D:Last Stand
Ability.Lua: if 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") < 35 then return true end

Ability.Name: D:Shield Wall
Ability.Lua: if 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") < 50 then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Demoralizing Shout
Ability.Lua: if UnitDebuffID("target",47437,"player") == nil and IsSpellInRange("Rend", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: A:Bladestorm(Sh)
Ability.Lua: if IsLeftShiftKeyDown() and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: A:Thunder Clap
Ability.Lua: if IsLeftAltKeyDown() and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: D:Shield Block
Ability.Lua: if 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") < 90 then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Enraged Regeneration
Ability.Lua: if 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") < 35 then return true end

Ability.Name: D:Devastate
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Devastate", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: D:Shield Slam
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Devastate", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: D:Revenge
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Devastate", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: D:Bloodthirst
Ability.Lua: if 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") < 85 and IsSpellInRange("Heroic Strike", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: D:Shockwave(Tank)
Ability.Lua: if 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") < 20 and IsSpellInRange("Heroic Strike", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: Racial:Berserking
Ability.Lua: if UnitLevel("target") == -1 then return true end

Ability.Name: Racial:Blood Fury
Ability.Lua:
if UnitLevel("target") == -1 then CastSpellByID(33697) end
if UnitLevel("target") == -1 then CastSpellByID(20572) end

Ability.Name: A:Hamstring
Ability.Lua: if UnitDebuffID("target",1715,"player") == nil and IsSpellInRange("Rend", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: -- Autotarget --
D:Vigilance
Ability.Lua:
if UnitAffectingCombat("player") == nil then
local mytarget = nil local doneVG = nil local tophp = 0 local allinrange = 1 local group = "party" local members = GetNumPartyMembers()
if GetNumRaidMembers() > 0 then group = "raid" members = GetNumRaidMembers() end
for i = 1, members, 1 do local member = group..tostring(i) local memberhp = UnitHealthMax(member) local _,_,_,_,_,_,_,source = UnitBuffID(member, 50720) if source == "player" then doneVG = 1 end if UnitInRange(member) == false then allinrange = nil end if memberhp > tophp and UnitInRange(member) and UnitIsUnit("player",member) == nil and source == nil and UnitGroupRolesAssigned("target") ~= "HEALER" then mytarget = member tophp = memberhp end end
if mytarget and doneVG == nil and allinrange and UnitIsDead(mytarget) == nil then CastSpellByID(50720, mytarget) end
end
